ese ma dhiwara karmanthayata nawika hamudawa aadhara karanne maha muhude di shri lanka dhiwaraya aaraksha kara ganimenuyi.mehidi oostreliyawata horen sankramanaya wana pudgalayan madimata shri lanka nawika hamudawa kala sewaya oostreliyanu nawika hamuda niladharin ge ha oostreliyanu rajaye pasasumata lakwi thiyenawa.shri lanka nawika hamudawata 60 wasarak pirime uthsawaya sarthaka kara ganimata mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumagen ha aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha gen lada maga penwimath nidahasath mahopakari wu bawath eya ma lada wishesha dhairyayak bawath prakasha kala hakiyi.daya di.

sapugaskanda thelpiripahaduwe piripahadu katayuthu eeye (28) sawasa yali aarambha kala bawa lanka khanija thel nithigatha sansthawa pawasayi.kolambaa waraye sita sapugaskanda thel piripahaduwa dakwa borathel prawahanaya karana nala margaye hadisi aluthwadiya katayuththak hethuwen pasugiya 15 wanida sita ehi katayuthu nathara kara thibimata siduwu bawath eeye sawas wanawita ehi wada katayuthu nima kirimata haki wu bawath sansthawa prakasha karayi.pasugiya sikurada borathel ragath naukawak kolambaa warayata pamini athara nala margaye binda watimak hethuwen sapugaskanda thel piripahaduwa wetha ema borathel prawahanaya kirimata apahasu wini.kolambaa waraye sita kilomitar 9 k pamana durin sita thel pompa kirime katayuthu sidukarana athara ehi boyawehi nalayaka adala aluth wadiya katayuthu sidukaranu labu athara me dinawala pawathi muhuda ralu swabhawaya aluth wadiya katayuthuwayata yam badhawak wu bawada sansthawa pawasayi..

49 ewita adoniya samanga siti amuththo siyallo ma biyapath wi, nangita ekineka thamathaman kamathi desata yannata giyo ya. 50 adoniya da salamon rajathumata biya wi, nangita gos pujasanaye konwalin nera giya an allagaththe ya. 51 thawada, ” ‘salamon raju thama mehekaruwa kaduwen nomarana lesa ada mata diwurum diya yuthu ya’yi kiyamin, adoniya pujasanaye konwalin nera giya an allagena siti”yayi salamon rajathumata danwana ladi.
